title: I have created a mini-me sticker with gboard, but the other person cannot see it in whatsapp.
content:
I have created a mini-me sticker with GBoard. I can use it for Messaging etc. and also upload it in WhatsApp conversations. The other person I am chatting with cannot see/download it. An error occurs saying it cannot be downloaded, please check connectivity etc. WiFi is avaiable, that is not the problem.
Chatting with the person via messeging works with these stickers.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
